https://tmrev.io/movie/256195-Alice Walker: Beauty in Truth 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eZGxXRGRtSl8vyRXKsEcsxjWKal.jpg The compelling story of an extraordinary woman's journey from her birth in a paper thin shack in the cotton fields of Georgia to her recognition as a key writer of the twentieth Century.Walker made history as the first black woman to win a Pulitzer Prize for her groundbreaking novel, The Color Purple. Alice Walker: Beauty in Truth
